response.original_title: The Art of Racing in the Rain
response.overview: A family dog – with a near-human soul and a philosopher's mind – evaluates his life through the lessons learned by his human owner, a race-car driver.
response.tagline: Meet the dog who will show the world how to be human.
response.title: The Art of Racing in the Rain

titles.title: L'art de courir sous la pluie
Enzo und die wundersame Welt der Menschen
El arte de vivir bajo la lluvia
Cuộc Đời Phi Thường Của Chú Chó Enzo
A Arte de Correr na Chuva
